document_data.name: Talanna Taenfeather
document_data.mainbody: '''Talanna Taenfeather''' was a member of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was a close friend of [[Araezra Hondyl]], her commander. She flirted with the Open Lord [[Dagult Neverember]] although they were apparently not yet lovers.
document_data.Abilities: Talanna was considered the fastest member of the guard and was usually the one who chased down suspects who fled.
document_data.Equipment: Talanna had a ''[[ring of featherfall]]'' given to her by the Open Lord after she was seriously injured in a fall from a rooftop. The ring allowed her to fall from a height at a slow rate.
document_data.Description: Talanna had bright red hair, which she often wore in exotic hairstyles.
